name: Profit LD44
description:
PROFIT is a dungeon looter with shop management elements set in a world where monetary currency has been replaced by life force. People from around the world will come to your shop to buy your freshly acquired wares. You are becoming tired of running your business day in and day out and have thus decided to pursue economic independency. In other words you must **become immortal**.

In PROFIT your primary goal is to gain enough life points to claim the ancient relic of immortality. In order to achieve this goal you must first search the deep dungeon for familiar items to sell for exorbitant prices.

CONTROLS:

**Move:** WASD.

**Sprint:** Double-tap WASD.

**Attack:** J.

**Dash:** K.

**Open inventory:** I.

**Equip item from inventory:** L.
